description: Employment and Social Development Canada is seeking a Senior Project Executive to support the workload of Old Age Security (OAS) on Benefit Delivery Modernization (BDM). The contractor will engage in supporting the remaining lifecycle of the project working closely with both the Crown as well as the System integrator (SI) with Deloitte in the successful delivery of Release 1 through release 3. Supporting the quality assurance of Risks, Actions, Issues, Decisions and Dependencies (RAIDD) impacting the project in a thoughtful and strategic manner.
full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Task-Based Professional Services (TBSMS)

**Reference Number:** cb-6869-94040491
**Amendment Number:** 4
**Solicitation Number:** 100023981
**Publication Date:** June 30th, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 18th, 2023, 14:00
**Amendment Date:** July 17th, 2023

**Tender Status:** Cancelled

**Procurement Category:** SRV

### Project Information

Employment and Social Development Canada is seeking a Senior Project Executive for the Benefit Delivery Modernization (BDM) project. The contractor will assist in supporting the remaining lifecycle of the project, working closely with the Crown and system integrator (SI) to deliver releases 1 through 3.

### Key Requirements

* Assist in quality assurance of risks, actions, issues, decisions, and dependencies impacting the project in a thoughtful and strategic manner
* Support the workload of Old Age Security (OAS) for BDM
* Collaborate with Deloitte in the successful delivery of release 1 through release 3

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contract Information

* Contracting Entity: Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC)
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

### Tender Document

The full tender document is available at: 

[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6869/tsps-npp-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6869/tsps-npp-en.pdf)

**Agency Information**

* Agency Contact: Sherri Macki
* Agency Email: nc-solicitations-g
